DataElement.preferredName: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee Consent Form Approval Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Date of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) approval of a trial and informed consent for use with veterinary patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee Consent Form Approval
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Reference to the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) approval of an informed consent for use in a veterinary study.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee Consent Form
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:A document explaining all relevant study information to assist the study volunteer in understanding the expectations and requirements of participation in a clinical trial. This document is presented to and signed by the study subject. (from centerwatch.com glossary)

Concepts.longName: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee
Concepts.definition: A self-regulating entity mandated by federal law to be established at an institution that uses laboratory animals for research or instructional purposes to oversee and evaluate all aspects of the institution's animal use and care program.

A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.

Property.preferredDefinition: Approved; established by authority; given authoritative approval.

Concepts.definition: Acceptance as satisfactory by an authoritative body; established by authority; given authoritative approval.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Concepts related to the treatment of veterinary subjects.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
